abstract: There is tension between the companies because Apple sometimes rejects Google’s applications for the App Store.
snippet: There is tension between the companies because Apple sometimes rejects Google’s applications for the App Store.
lead_paragraph: Google might power the world’s most popular search engine, but its clout goes only so far. When it comes to getting one of its applications onto the iPhone, it seems Google has to wait in line for Apple’s approval like everyone else  and face the risk of rejection.

headline.main: Even Google Is Blocked With Apps for iPhone
headline.print_headline: Even Google Is Blocked With Apps For iPhone

abstract: A Harvard graduate student is surveying iPhone users to help answer an age-old question: What makes people happy?
snippet: A Harvard graduate student is surveying iPhone users to help answer an age-old question: What makes people happy?
lead_paragraph: Can the Apple iPhone, which supplies hours of entertainment, actually measure your happiness?

headline.main: If You’re Happy and You Know It, Tell Your Phone
